definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman

sentences.english: At this stage they are reliant on their mother's milk.
sentences.chinese: 在这个阶段需以母狮的奶存活。

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病发病率的上升是与液体奶摄入量的增加并行的。

sentences.english: He can learn when each cow was milked and how much she produced.
sentences.chinese: 他能够知道每头奶牛何时挤奶，挤了多少奶。

sentences.english: A milkmaid was going to the market. She carried her milk in a pail on her head.
sentences.chinese: 一个挤奶的女孩打算去市场，她用脑袋顶着一桶奶。

sentences.english: The invention discloses watermelon juice nutritious milk and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 一种西瓜汁营养奶及其制备方法。

sentences.english: All our drinks come with whole milk, unless you ordred something different. We also offer nonfat milk.
sentences.chinese: 所有饮品均选用全脂奶，你可选择脱脂奶。

sentences.english: After Wangtie had eaten a piece of cake, he drank a glass of milk.
sentences.chinese: 当王铁吃了一块蛋糕后，他喝了一杯奶。

sentences.english: You may have a glass of milk.
It is these techniques that will allow, among other things, the creation of cloned herds of sheep and cows that produce medicines in their milk.
sentences.chinese: 正是这些技术使人们可以创造能产出药物奶的羊和牛。

sentences.english: The baby sicked up a little milk.
And temperature  extremes reduce animal production of meat or milk products.
sentences.chinese: 而且，极端的温度会使动物的肉产量和奶产量减少。

sentences.english: World's first camel-milk chocolates going global.
sentences.chinese: 世界首个骆驼奶巧克力在阿联酋问世。

sentences.english: They not only pull sleighs, but are also raised for their milk.
sentences.chinese: 人们养它不只是拉雪橇，还要它们提供奶。

sentences.english: The problem is formula-fed babies often gain too much weight.
sentences.chinese: 问题是吃配方奶的宝宝们长的太重了。

sentences.english: Open coconut milk, put a little (around 5 table spoons) on the heating pan.
sentences.chinese: 开棷奶罐，倒约5茶匙份量的棷奶在热锅上。

sentences.english: The annual bull-taming festival is celebrated as part of the south Indian harvest festival of Pongal.
sentences.chinese: 驯牛节是庆祝收获的奶粥节的一部份。

definition: to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
hey/to feed (an animal, baby, invalid etc)
milk from a woman's breast/milk (used in the names of dishes to indicate white sauce)
